name: Bitriel Wallets
des: A self-custodian multiple-asset digital wallet used to store, stake and exchange digital assets through a decentralized blockchain network.

name: Selendra Staking
des: A developers' friendly, easy to learn, blockchain development environment for early adopters to build their own applications.

name: KOOMPI FiFi
des: Develops, deploy and maintains Wi-Fi hotspot services on school campuses and within rural villages with services paid in Selendra (SEL) token & stablecoins.

name: Tokens Faucet
des: Request Selendra (SEL) tokens for testing and development purposes. Testnet tokens have no real-world asset value, and are used exclusively for testing and developing new applications.

name: Staking on Bitriel
des: A friendly User Interface (UI) experience for staking your Selendra (SEL) assets. Earn rewards and put your digital assets to work through the process of staking. Coming soon!
